ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: We would like to express our deepest gratitude toward the members of the Advanced Fluid Mechanics Research Group at the University of Western Ontario, especially Dwaipayan Sarkar, for his assistance with conducting the experiments. We would also like to thank our colleagues at Sunnybrook Research Institute for performing the viral analysis. Finally, we would like to thank the staff at UWO Student Health Services, for their assistance with the recruitment of participants.
